channel.title: uber on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in uber on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Uber blunder in Essex
item.description: Bit the bullet and ordered my first Uber ride in November 2014 when I was in London. It went very well but it was for a very short trip. The second one was in April 2015 and it was from stansted airport to a nearby b&b about 15 minutes away. I loved the fact that you know beforehand who will be picking you up, what the reg number of the car is and where the car is on a map.
